title: MCE 544 Machine Vision
body:
Day 1 Jul 2, 2024

Machine vision and machine will be used interchangable

read [[MCE 514 Remote Sensing]]

radiance how much of the energy is illuminated
bleuminance total amount of energy that flows from the light source bright is high dark is zero

for an image to form a function of illumination and reflectance must be formed

understand pixels in relation to a picture
